Who is Shreyash Purankar?

A Bit About Me

I am a C++ software developer passionate about crafting efficient and robust software solutions. I excel at transforming complex challenges into elegant code. My expertise lies in designing and building scalable systems.

My problem-solving skills and attention to detail enable me to deliver high-quality software products. I am committed to staying up-to-date with the latest advancements in the field.

Beyond technical skills, I am a collaborative team player eager to contribute to innovative projects. I am always seeking opportunities to learn and grow as a software developer.

What I've Crafted

I'm always tinkering with new projects. Here's a look at what I've built.

01

Boost Chat Application

The application efficiently handles concurrent connections using Boost::Asio, enabling real-time communication between multiple users. Leveraging asynchronous programming and CMake for build management, the server provides a solid foundation for scalable and cross-platform chat applications.

  • C++
  • Boost::Asio
  • CMake
  • Git

02

Data Compression

This project involved implementing efficient file I/O and performance optimizations. The application effectively encodes and decodes files, demonstrating proficiency in C++, data structures, and algorithm implementation. Built using CMake for cross-platform compatibility.

  • C++
  • Data Structures & Algorithms
  • CMake
  • Git
  • Github ‚Üí

03

Cpp Chat App

Capable of efficiently managing multiple concurrent client connections. Implemented a dynamic user identification system, allowing each client to establish a unique identity within the network. This project showcases proficiency in network programming, multi-threading, and user-centric design.

  • C++
  • WinSock
  • CMake
  • Git
  • Github ‚Üí

04

Career Mitra

This online platform is designed to support students in their academic journey. It offers practice quizzes tailored to 10th and 12th-grade curriculums to help them prepare for exams. Additionally, students can connect with experienced mentors for guidance and advice. To assist with career preparation, a resume builder tool is also available.

  • Javascript
  • PHP
  • HTML & CSS
  • MySQL
  • Git
  • Live Site ‚Üí

05

SQLite CRUD App

Implemented robust CRUD operations to create, read, update, and delete records directly within the database. Leveraging C++'s performance and SQLite's embedded nature for a high-performance solution.

  • C++
  • SQLite
